raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:


The pharmaceutical compositions generally are administered in an amount effective for treatment or prophylaxis of a specific indication or indications. In general, the compositions are administered in an amount of at least about 10 μg/kg body weight. In most cases they will be administered in an amount not in excess of about 8 μg/kg body weight per day. Preferably, in most cases, dose is from about 10 μg/kg to about 2 μg/kg body weight, daily.
